div.div: at Delaware, Ohio, USA | Selby Stadium

tr.td: * Oberlin wins and defers, OWU will receive and defend N goal.

Kevin Herman rush over right end for 7 yards to the OBE49 (Clay Eaton;J. Hochendoner).
